title: Three-dimensional NiCoS nanotubes@NiCo-LDH nanosheets core–shell heterostructure for high-rate capability alkaline zinc-based batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7999-8006
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00521J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Linxi Dai, Shangshu Peng, Xinhai Wang, Bo Chen, Yang Wu, Quan Xie, Yunjun Ruan
Aqueous alkaline zinc-based batteries (AAZBs) hold promising prospects for large-scale applications due to their high working voltage, safety, and low cost.
